attributes.action: Prevent those stripped of citizenship  being given legal aid
attributes.background: Individuals stripped of citizenship for treasonous and unlawful activity should not be allowed legal aid to challenge the decision and neither should their families, in order to challenge on their behalf

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the decision on whether to give legal aid is the responsibility of the Legal Aid Agency and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could sign this petition if you would like to prevent people who are found to be ISIS members from returning to the UK:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231521
